8b85957e-4440-4f81-a264-967fc5af6868.description: IMNZ is part of Skills Consulting Group. The earner of this badge completed the Project Management Fundamentals programme, understanding the basics of project management and the core tools needed to manage projects of all sizes. The earner established an understanding of work breakdown structures, project tracking, various tracking tools and how to successfully close and complete a project.
8b85957e-4440-4f81-a264-967fc5af6868.name: Project Management Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: The earner engaged in and attended all three face-to-face sessions and collaborated with their facilitator and peers.
The earner partook in all exercises and activities, including creating an action plan, completing network diagrams, creating Gantt charts, completing an interactive tower building exercise in teams.
The earner partook in completing a project charter and working in a team for a project planning exercise.

skills.name: Knowledge of evaluation and reporting tools
Understands how to scope a project

962f1c29-975a-4375-a63e-2b039fc83e86.description: IMNZ is part of Skills Consulting Group. The earner of this badge completed the Leadership Essentials programme, expanding their leadership capabilities and learnt the fundamental skills needed to lead a team. The earner established an understanding of what good leadership looks like and how to best communicate to be an effective leader.
962f1c29-975a-4375-a63e-2b039fc83e86.name: Leadership Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: The earner engaged in and attended the two face-to-face sessions and collaborated with their facilitator and peers.
The earner completed an activity identifying the characteristics of effective and ineffective leaders.
The earner completed an active listening activity in groups.
The earner completed an activity identifying the different types of communications and their effectiveness in their business.
The earner completed a time management exercise; identifying the areas their tasks fell under and how to use tools effectively.
The earner completed an exercise identifying how they approach conflicts under certain banners.
The earner completed exercises on delegation, including looking at reasons for avoiding delegation and a group discussion on personal successful delegations.
The earner completed a delegation self-assessment and table exercise.
The earner created an action plan around what skills or tools they will use from the course, and how they will be used.

f2dce166-db30-4ba6-b799-7555a9b2195b.description: The earner of this badge understands the level of professionalism required in the financial services industry, acting in the best interest of customers. They have knowledge of the wider New Zealand financial services environment, the legislation and regulation and are able to use research and analysis to develop fit for purpose insurance solutions.
f2dce166-db30-4ba6-b799-7555a9b2195b.name: MAS: Financial Service Industry Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of Financial Services Industry topic and post-assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful completion of Financial Service legislation and regulation topic and post-assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Earner has demonstrated understanding of good conduct obligations in client interactions, including the advice process and the key elements of legal, ethical, and professional obligations.
Earner has demonstrated they are able to provide a range of financial advice solutions to clients using knowledge of key financial institutions, systems, markets, and products/services.

skills.name: Understand compliance in the financial industry
Understand risk in the financial industry

9ff3c797-1cd7-4190-8e7f-515f9fd6cd68.description: The earner is able to understand the Skills Consulting Group business, what products and services we deliver, and how to consult in an efficient and effective way. The programme also establishes an understanding of the core consulting competencies required to be a successful consultant, and creates a pathway for earners to develop their consulting capability.
9ff3c797-1cd7-4190-8e7f-515f9fd6cd68.name: 2022 Consulting School

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance and engagement in all five one-day sessions.

skills.name: Communicate a business' offers, products and delivery
Understand how to maximise their utilisation

c30bd819-e17d-4c8d-a3de-521beab41f0d.description: The earner of this badge has mastered Member (customer) conversation and sales skills. They understand the value of quality member interactions and how to provide it. They understand the MAS Sales and Advice Process and how to use it to have a meaningful needs-based conversation. The earner is equipped with everything they need to have member focused conversations supporting good member outcomes.
c30bd819-e17d-4c8d-a3de-521beab41f0d.name: MAS: Kōrero Mai Sales and Advice Framework

badge_template_activities.title: Earner has completed the Kōrero Mai MAS Sales and Advice process concepts and principles topics
Earner has demonstrated understanding of good conduct obligations in client interactions, including during the advice process
Earner has completed a Member Scenario, demonstrating MAS best practice
Earner has consistently achieved practical observations designed to implement the MAS Sales and Advice framework concepts presented in real-world application

skills.name: Asking questions to gather information to better understand Member needs
Develop a suitable recommendation that reasonably meet the Members needs.
Keep detailed and accurate records of all Member interactions
Overcoming concerns using a consultative approach
Present solution aligned to Member needs
Provide advice in relation to MAS Insurance Products using the Six-step advice process
Provide clear information and instruction to the Member throughout the interaction and administrative process.

3d2ac4b9-7ef7-4e87-82d6-26abe67721cf.description: The earner of this badge understands the risk management concepts and legislation associated with life and disability insurance. Earners have demonstrated comprehensive knowledge of MAS Life and Disability insurance products, along with key skills in client conversations, product application and review.
3d2ac4b9-7ef7-4e87-82d6-26abe67721cf.name: MAS: Life and Disability Insurance

badge_template_activities.title: Successful achievement of Life and Disability Insurance concepts and principles topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful completion of Life and Disability Insurance legislation, regulation and codes of practice topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful completion of Life and Disability Insurance products topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful completion of Life and Disability Insurance products application and review process topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.

skills.name: Administrative processes for insurance policy cancellation
Administrative processes for insurance policy maintenance
Administrative processes for life and disability insurance underwriting
Administrative processes for managing insurance claims
Meet Member needs using MAS Life and Disability Insurance products
Understand and apply knowledge of Life Insurance Policy ownership
Understand and comply with legislation relevant to Life & Disability Insurance
Understanding Life and Disability insurance and value of having it
Understand Life & Disability Insurance industry and their role in it

5d06754b-79f7-41df-b2e7-5af0730b523a.description: The earner of this badge understands the management concepts and legislative and regulatory environment associated with investments. Earners have demonstrated comprehensive knowledge of MAS Investment products, along with key skills in Member conversations, product application and review.
5d06754b-79f7-41df-b2e7-5af0730b523a.name: MAS: Investments

badge_template_activities.title: Successful achievement of MAS Investments post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful completion of MAS Investments legislation, regulation and codes of practice topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful completion of MAS Investments products topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful completion of MAS Investments products application and review process topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.

skills.name: Meet members needs using MAS Investment products
Understand and comply with KiwiSaver Act
Understand and comply with the Income Tax Act
Understand the role of Inland Revenue in KiwiSaver
Understand the role of the FMA in KiwiSaver

a70f22cd-d48e-4335-bec8-d4b579c23f91.description: This 11-month programme drives awareness regarding what it takes to be a high-performance board and provide in-depth, practical education about the board’s importance and functioning. It explores what boards should focus on, what they legally must focus on and what it takes to contribute as a high-performing board member. You will also gain working knowledge of the essential tools required for effective board meetings including governance documents, board papers and board calendar.
a70f22cd-d48e-4335-bec8-d4b579c23f91.name: Applied Directorship Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Attend monthly 4-hour workshops.
Complete all additional 68 self-learning modules.
Actively participate in fictitious board meetings.
Assume different board roles in role play exercises.
Complete six self-assessments.
Complete three assignments.

skills.name: Organisational Culture at a board level
Risk Management and Compliance at board level

dd84015b-3efd-4404-83b8-4e2490a19eb0.description: This certification indicates that the badge earner has undergone a rigorous training and assessment programme and has demonstrated the necessary skills to provide appropriate general insurance solutions for customers for products underwritten by IAG. Earners of this badge have an in-depth knowledge of personal or commercial general insurance products and underwriting, as well as a broader understanding of the financial services industry.
dd84015b-3efd-4404-83b8-4e2490a19eb0.name: IAG: Financial Services & General Insurance

badge_template_activities.title: Successful achievement of 25-35 online modules and assessments as part of underwriting academy training.
Successful achievement of four written case study assessments as part of underwriting academy training.
Successful demonstration of on-job experience as part of underwriting academy training.
Successful achievement of all Financial Services core competency training (12x online modules/assessments)
Successful achievement of compliance training module/assessment related to laws and regulations impacting insurance.
Successful demonstration of on-job product knowledge via quality audit results.

f48c7e7a-54a2-405c-a0e8-d64aa926c6c1.description: IMNZ is part of Skills Consulting Group. The earner of this badge completed the Elevate programme, understanding how to engage individuals and teams, drive performance improvement and deliver exceptional results through their team. The earner established an understanding of authentic leadership, the differences between leading and managing, and how to use behavioural insights to get the best from others.
f48c7e7a-54a2-405c-a0e8-d64aa926c6c1.name: Elevate

badge_template_activities.title: The earner engaged in and attended all three face-to-face sessions and collaborated with their facilitator and peers.

The earner partook in all exercises and activities, including identifying their personality traits and how they impact their leadership, working in teams to analyse moral and intrinsic motivations, and creating different user personas.
The earner partook in creating a learning and development plan, completing a competitor analysis, and creating an action plan.
The earner partook in scenario-based activities, such as a push and pull team scenario and creating a gamified task.
The earner discussed relevant and current case studies.

skills.name: Understands diversity and inclusion in the workplace

2e65ffac-3f4b-4830-9a8e-45a663744200.description: The earner has been able to increase their capability to understand themselves so they can shift across self-awareness, cultural knowledge, cultural awareness, and cultural sensitivity when engaging with different Pacific Islands people, groups, or ethnic communities. The ability to navigate Pacific Islands groups and articulate knowledge to others demonstrates Pacific cultural fluency.
2e65ffac-3f4b-4830-9a8e-45a663744200.name: Pacific Cultural Fluency

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and actively participate in all five workshops.
Actively participate in all post-workshop feedback sessions.
Self-directed learning of 7 Pacific Islands nations in-between workshops.
Reflect on current practice and engagement with Pacific Islands people or groups, and evaluate areas for improvement and success
Apply knowledge to work and non-work situations.
Present knowledge and findings to the group.

b47d490d-3be1-4208-8200-722916871702.description: A 3 hour course for learners on how to deliver effective and interactive teaching & learning strategies for the Professional Diploma Meister in Lift and Escalator Engineering Programme at HKQF L5. Interactive strategies increase teacher-student interaction, encourage participants to be active in their learning, understanding and making meaning, which increases long-term memory retention, improving their autonomy, self-motivation, goal setting, negotiation, self-assessment & critical thinking.
b47d490d-3be1-4208-8200-722916871702.name: Lift & Escalator Meister Programme: Interactive Learning and Assessment Strategies

badge_template_activities.title: Participants attended a three-hour continuing professional development workshop.

Participants completed a post-workshop assignment which was to create a lesson plan and resources for an interactive session for the Professional Diploma Meister in Lift and Escalator Engineering Programme at HKQF Level 5. This was marked by Vocational Training Council Hong Kong and confirmed by Skills Consulting Group.

By the end of the workshop and assignment, participants were able to: Evaluate the effectiveness of different methods of delivery content; align learning to types of assessment, including Workplace Assessment.

By the end of the workshop and assignment, participants were also able to: Describe the purpose and benefits of using interactive teaching strategies for teaching; describe multiple interactive teaching strategies and tools for effective teaching; develop a learning session/workshop that includes multiple interactive teaching strategies.

972617ce-8d58-4c4f-b2ab-2378066d6a24.description: The earner of this badge understands the management concepts and legislative and regulatory environment associated with Business Risk insurance. Earners have demonstrated comprehensive knowledge of MAS Business Risk insurance products, along with key skills in Member conversations, product application and review.
972617ce-8d58-4c4f-b2ab-2378066d6a24.name: MAS: Business Risk Insurance

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of Business Risk Insurance legislation, regulation and codes of practice topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful achievement of Business Risk Insurance post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful completion of Business Risk Insurance products topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.
Successful completion of Business Risk Insurance products application and review process topic and post-topic assessment with a mastery level of 100%.

skills.name: Administrative processes for business risk insurances
Understand and apply knowledge of Business Risk Insurance Policy ownership
Understand and comply with legislation relevant to business risk insurances

The earner partook in all exercises and activities, including creating an action plan, completing network diagrams and creating Gantt charts.
The earner partook in completing a project charter and working in a team for a project planning exercise.

822cca79-35ea-4897-a386-3707d86814fc.description: The earner of this badge has completed Policy Fundamentals with Distinction developing the key skills and knowledge required across the policy development cycle and has been able to showcase this via rigorous assessment. The earner has the skills & knowledge to: •conduct a thorough analysis of an issue •curate a compelling narrative to support decision-making •navigate the NZ government decision-making processes •create advice that is fit-for-purpose and written in polished, plain English.
822cca79-35ea-4897-a386-3707d86814fc.name: Frank Capability: Policy Fundamentals with Distinction

badge_template_activities.title: The earner must attend at least 80% of 12 hours of facilitator-led, live-learning sessions
The earner must complete all online modules
The earner must complete all 11 pieces of coursework which pass peer and facilitator review
The earner must achieve the final written paper by completing it to the standards required based on the learning through the course
The earner must achieve 100% pass rate on the final quiz in Week Five
The earner must engage with their learning group by offering feedback on each other’s coursework every week
The earner must contribute to group discussions to progress the group’s collective understanding

6e91ad97-a70e-4173-a25b-561db33cfbb0.description: This module is designed to recognise and reward the progress that learners make in developing knowledge in hazardous substances and the specific classes which are used throughout industry. They are also suitable for people who wish to progress their career to apply to become a compliance certifier or expand their certifier scope.
6e91ad97-a70e-4173-a25b-561db33cfbb0.name: Hazardous Substances Professional Specialist Module: Classes 2 & 3 - Flammable gases and liquids

badge_template_activities.title: The earner can discuss the findings of their site audit report in a professional conversation with their assessor.
The earner can view a simulated 360° virtual walk through of a fictitious site requiring a site audit, gather evidence and produce a compliant site audit report.
The earner can demonstrate understanding of HSNO hazardous substances classes, the Health and Safety at Work (Hazardous Substances) Regulations 2017, and location compliance certificates.

7448230e-6c66-44f3-89a0-09ce56b6d7e7.description: The earner of this badge has completed Policy Fundamentals, developing the key skills and knowledge required across the policy development cycle. It supports the earner to deliver quality advice, every time. The earner has the skills & knowledge to: • conduct a thorough analysis of an issue •curate a compelling narrative to support decision-making •navigate the NZ government decision-making processes •create advice that is fit-for-purpose and written in polished, plain English.
7448230e-6c66-44f3-89a0-09ce56b6d7e7.name: Frank Capability: Policy Fundamentals

The earner must complete all online modules

The earner must engage with their learning group by offering feedback on each other’s coursework every week
The earner must contribute to group discussions to progress the group’s collective understanding
